website_summaries.verdict: Every teacher needs a plan book, and this attractive and sturdy book can carry you from July to June.
pros: Plan for up to 7 subjects per week
Book gives monthly and weekly views
Appealing cover design and interior font
cons: The plan book does not include a grid for grades

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cheap, fast!
customer_reviews.text: This came fast, it's cute, it's thicker than I expected, and it was cheap. What more can you ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best Homeschool Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our first year homeschooling and it’s been great so far! The pages are nicely laid out, simple and to the point which I like. No over thinking it (for me). I also snagged it on sale which is a plus. But I’d gladly pay full price for it. Definitely recommenced.
customer_reviews.author: D Couts

customer_reviews.title: Great planner
customer_reviews.text: Super cute planner! When I bought this the price was under $4 then the next day I looked and it was bumped up to $7. So I am glad that I got it for cheaper since I’m on a budget. I will definitely be purchasing again for all of my planners. It would be worth the $7 so either way this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my planner in and it is even better than I thought it would be. I didn’t think there was a space for grade keeping but there is in the back of the book. The cover has a nice feel to it too, definitely feels more expensive than the price I paid for it and will be ordering again next year!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect planner for planning my homeschool year!
customer_reviews.text: The Teacher Planner is perfect for planning out my homeschool year. It's exactly what I needed! I've purchased other planners and didn't use half the pages so I feel like I wasted my money. However, this planner is simple and works perfectly for me. I also love design and how well it's made. The price is right for such amazing quality! I'll be purchasing another planner for my business.
customer_reviews.author: Blessings by Me

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying one again next school year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this planner a few months ago because I wanted to write my plans down this year instead of using the computer. I have lived this method so much. It’s quicker to pick up this planner and figure out what I’m doing for the day. I teach prek students. I love the monthly calendar inbetween the weekly planning pages. I thought it was cute to add things at the end like class birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: My planner is missing months: February, March, April. As I was planning out my daughters school year, I noticed that the book goes from January to May... not a good look. I really was enjoying it until I found this issue. It would have had 4 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: LE77

customer_reviews.title: Large boxes and made just for me
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for a lesson planner. As a homeschooling mom of two I’ve got to keep up with both. The style is so “me”! And the price is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cute
customer_reviews.text: I’m getting organized for special needs homeschool for our first year. This planner makes me smile every time I look at it. Laid out in a very nice way to help organize your classroom in school or at home. I love it so much! Super value for the price. Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Ts Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great planner for homeschooling!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and simple planner! Perfect for our homeschool year! I love the combination of a full calendar outline for each month and also pages to plan week by week and by subject. Really admire that there are cute fonts throughout the planner too making it fun to look at! Recommending it to all my other homeschool mamas!
customer_reviews.author: OurCooperNest

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great planner!!!! At first when I received it, there was nothing in the envelope but I got it today and it is great! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and pretty
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as it describes: pretty and simple. The monthly and weekly planning pages are clear and uncluttered with adequate space for lesson planning. The extra blank grid pages in the back are versatile. My only suggestion for improvement is to make it spiral-bound so it lays flat. Otherwise, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect. Wish it included weekends on the week pages.
customer_reviews.author: George Burdell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - I will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I really like the simplicity and clean look of this planner. Paper is nice and smooth and of good thickness. My highlighters do not bleed through. Large block spaces to write detailed notes.
customer_reviews.author: mmelhorn

customer_reviews.title: Great Planner for Homeschool
customer_reviews.text: This planner is so good! I love that it has a full monthly view for each month then breaks it down into weeks. Also, there is plenty of room to write all of my sons homeschool curriculum and activities!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Cackley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect undated any subject agenda
customer_reviews.text: Love this calendar. Perfect for what I wanted because it allows me to fill in the dates and subjects I need and not use preset ones. That also means aside from the monthly calendars you could use it into next school year if you don’t need it this year or didn’t use the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: mah

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a new homeschooler to three children, this planner has been SO amazing for keeping me organized with the progress of my children and their lesson plans. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The perfect planner for the school month since I did decide to homeschool! Even though my daughter is enrolled and online learning. The stuff her teacher did give her was kind of all over the place so this book help me with making up my own curriculum
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great planner, especially for the price point. I love that there are monthly pages and then weekly pages in between! It’s perfect for homeschool scheduling and even has room to fit meal plans in. The cover is super cute and overall this is a great quality planner. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Crain

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I love this planner! I spent $30-$40 on a Happy Planner last year and an extra $10 for all the happy planner stickers! Never again! This is the perfect size planner and great quality. I’m honestly surprised this planner isn’t $10 or more!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TEACHER PLANNER
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this planner for 3 consecutive years. It's perfect for me because have 7 rows with enough room to separate each class period during the school day. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Maiquel Querales

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cute little planner!! It even has a section for grading in the back! Must have for teachers!
customer_reviews.author: Tkaira Davis

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect! Very customizable and exactly what I need for my PreK curriculum.
customer_reviews.author: mommyca

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this planner! I wanted something simple that was for teachers. It wasn't very expensive and arrived faster than expected! I will defiantly purchase from this shop again!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the layout of this planner!!! It is 100% perfect for my use with my in home preschool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, great price Took a long time to arrive and was damaged. If I didn't need this immediately I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Simple and pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like the cover material and the simplicity of this planner
customer_reviews.author: April L. Maston

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very Inexpensive. This has enough space to write your daily work. I could purchase this again for the next school year.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one child
customer_reviews.text: Third year using this planner for one child. Love the layout.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teachers!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last year and loved it so much I ordered again for this year. Columns are big enough to write lessons and meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Liz prichard

customer_reviews.title: Great planner! Great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great planner! Lots of room to write in details of what needs to be accomplished each day for each subject
customer_reviews.author: Bellusfemina

customer_reviews.title: School
customer_reviews.text: For the price I love this planner!! I like that you get to write the dates for the weeks in
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great planner!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent planner - purchased it a couple of years now!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect planner
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, simple and elegant for an AMAZING price! I will buy these every year!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect curriculum calendar
customer_reviews.text: Perfect teacher planner, absolutely love it! The calendar blocks are very spacious and the detail is awesome. Definitely recommend for planning curriculum!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Great teaching planner
customer_reviews.text: This is my first year homeschooling and I needed a planner. After searching for hours I chose this one. I LOVE IT!!! Plenty of room to write down lesson plans and notes. Calendar for every month w/ all the holidays listed. And, the best thing is isn't expensive. The cover is paperback but, haven't had any problems with it bending or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Aprincss2day

customer_reviews.title: Casual to MUST
customer_reviews.text: I was a casual planner. Now that I have this, I love planning my activities for my kindergarteners with day slots and enough space for a little note in each box. I also appreciate that if I skip a week, it doesn't really matter, and can pick it up at any time.
customer_reviews.author: colton

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: I am homeschooling my grandson and this planner is perfect ! Just the right size with plenty of space to write lessons for the week. Love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This has worked out amazingly to plan my son's online schooling
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Teacher planner with a dark side
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor ordered this and just received it the other day and this is what was inside!! Highly inappropriate but funny at the same time!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for this teacher!!
customer_reviews.text: This planner is perfect! It is hard to find a good planner that meets all my teacher needs, but this one does! LOVE: the month and weekly views, the option to write the weeks for school, the size is perfect to put in my school bag and lay out on my desk, the quotes at the top of each month are simple and cute, the special days on the month view calendar are great! The weekly view with M-F and plenty of space to write my plans for the week are perfect! I will get this planner over and over again!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cabello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely lobe this planner. I’m a daycare teacher and it is so very helpful
customer_reviews.author: jasmine adkins
